item.title: Reviving a neglected blog
item.description: There are times when certain things in life need to take a bit of a break, and this blog was one of them this past year. Iâ€™ve always enjoyed writing on here, but it had become just another thing I felt I had to do, and so I made the decision to just give it up for a while.
